option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: sub-RAPIDTIDETEST.nii.gz ../dst/sub-RAPIDTIDETEST2 --tmask tmask3.txt --corrmask sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_restrictedmask.nii.gz --globalmeaninclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_brainmask.nii.gz --globalmeanexclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_nullmask.nii.gz --refineinclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_brainmask.nii.gz --refineexclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_nullmask.nii.gz --offsetinclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_brainmask.nii.gz --offsetexclude sub-RAPIDTIDETEST_nullmask.nii.gz --spatialfilt -1 --savelags --autosync --checkpoint --timerange 11 -1 --saveintermediatemaps --bipolar --nolimitoutput --calccoherence --dispersioncalc --nprocs 1 --passes 2 --numnull 0 --similaritymetric hybrid --globalsignalmethod meanscale --refineprenorm var --motionfile fakemotion.par
